About this site

The design for this website is based on the lab sites of Trevor Bedford and Premal Shah. The fonts are the same ones used on Cole Trapnell’s site.

Whereas those sites are built with Jekyll, this site is built with Hugo and deployed with Netlify. The port from Jekyll to Hugo was done by the outstanding Taras Kumpanenko.

The source code is freely available under the MIT license. If you use the code in your own site, I’d appreciate links back to hugheylab.org and bedford.io.
